patthana1.12:1.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:2.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:3.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:4.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.12:5.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— asekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:6.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā …pe…
patthana1.12:6.1_1: asekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:7.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:7.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana1.12:7.1_4: dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:8.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:9.1_0: Asekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:10.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.12:10.1_9: āsevanapaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:11.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati āsevanapaccayā—nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:11.1_2: kammapaccayā, vipākapaccayā—vipākaṁ sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:12.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho dhammo uppajjati vipākapaccayā—asekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca … tīṇi.
patthana1.12:13.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati vipākapaccayā—vipākaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:13.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana1.12:14.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati vipākapaccayā—vipāke sekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:15.1_0: Asekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati vipākapaccayā—asekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:16.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho dhammo uppajjati āhārapaccayā …
patthana1.12:17.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
patthana1.12:19.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:19.1_3: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:19.1_8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.12:20.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā— sekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:21.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—asekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:22.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:23.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—sekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:24.1_0: Asekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—asekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:25.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—sekkhe khandhe paṭicca sekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:26.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—asekkhe khandhe paṭicca asekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:27.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.12:27.1_9: Vipākaṁ sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:28.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— sekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:29.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—vipākaṁ sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:30.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho dhammo … tīṇi.
patthana1.12:31.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā …
patthana1.12:31.1_1: nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ (ekaṁ, paripuṇṇaṁ, sekkhañca, nevasekkhanāsekkhañca, ghaṭanā paripuṇṇā, dvepi kātabbā.
patthana1.12:31.1_2: Nava) nakammapaccayā— sekkhe khandhe paṭicca sekkhā cetanā.
patthana1.12:32.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkhā cetanā;
patthana1.12:33.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.12:34.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā— sekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:35.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti navipākapaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe….
patthana1.12:36.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā.
patthana1.12:37.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā—sekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:38.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā …
patthana1.12:39.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati nasampayuttapaccayā …pe….
patthana1.12:40.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.12:40.1_1: Arūpe sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.12:41.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe asekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.12:42.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:43.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.12:45.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.12:47.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṁ.
patthana1.12:50.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.12:51.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.12:52.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (paripuṇṇaṁ), mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā.
patthana1.12:53.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā sekkhā khandhā.
patthana1.12:54.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā asekkhā khandhā.
patthana1.12:55.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sekkhā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:56.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā asekkhā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:57.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:58.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:59.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:59.1_2: Sekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.12:61.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana1.12:62.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho dhammo … ekaṁ.
patthana1.12:63.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.12:63.1_1: ekaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā, cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:63.1_2: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā.
patthana1.12:64.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā sekkhā khandhā.
patthana1.12:65.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā asekkhā khandhā.
patthana1.12:66.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:67.1_0: Asekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—asekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:68.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā …
patthana1.12:68.1_8: āsevanapaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:69.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati āsevanapaccayā—nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā …pe…
patthana1.12:70.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati āsevanapaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā sekkhā khandhā.
patthana1.12:71.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati āsevanapaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:72.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati kammapaccayā …
patthana1.12:73.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane cattāri, kamme sattarasa, vipāke sattarasa, āhāre sattarasa, indriye jhāne magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.12:75.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:75.1_3: khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paccayā …pe…
patthana1.12:75.1_9: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.12:76.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā …pe….
patthana1.12:77.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—sekkhe khandhe paccayā sekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:78.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—asekkhe khandhe paccayā asekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:79.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (paripuṇṇaṁ) asaññasattānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:80.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā sekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:81.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā asekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:82.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—sekkhe khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā sekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:83.1_0: Asekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—asekkhe khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā asekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:84.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naanantarapaccayā …
patthana1.12:85.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkhā cetanā.
patthana1.12:86.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā sekkhā cetanā.
patthana1.12:87.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—sekkhe khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā sekkhā cetanā.
patthana1.12:88.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā. (Sekkhamūlake tīṇi.)
patthana1.12:89.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā.
patthana1.12:90.1_0: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā.
patthana1.12:91.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā …
patthana1.12:92.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.12:94.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.12:96.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:99.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:100.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—asekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:101.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:102.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.12:103.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme tīṇi …pe…
patthana1.12:105.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.12:105.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.12:106.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—sekkhe khandhe saṁsaṭṭho sekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:107.1_0: Asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho asekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—asekkhe khandhe saṁsaṭṭho asekkho adhipati.
patthana1.12:108.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana1.12:109.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā …
patthana1.12:110.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.12:112.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.12:114.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṁ.
patthana1.12:117.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:118.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sekkhā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:119.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:121.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nevasekkhanāsekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:122.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, sekkhaṁ phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena sekkhacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti, sekkhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:123.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— arahā asekkhaṁ phalaṁ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇena asekkhacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, asekkhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:124.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana1.12:124.1_1: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.12:124.1_2: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:124.1_3: Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.12:124.1_5: vatthuṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti …pe…
patthana1.12:124.1_6: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nevasekkhanāsekkhacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa …pe…
patthana1.12:124.1_10: nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:125.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— nibbānaṁ maggassa, sekkhassa phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:126.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— nibbānaṁ asekkhassa phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:127.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:128.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.12:128.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, sekkhaṁ phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.12:129.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:129.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—sekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:130.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:131.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.12:132.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:132.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—asekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:133.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.12:133.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, ariyā nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:133.1_2: Cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.12:133.1_4: vatthuṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.12:133.1_5: **Sahajātādhipati**—nevasekkhanāsekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:134.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:135.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:136.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā sekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ sekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:136.1_2: sekkhaṁ phalaṁ sekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:137.1_0: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggo asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:138.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— sekkhaṁ phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:139.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā asekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:139.1_1: Asekkhaṁ phalaṁ asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:140.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— asekkhaṁ phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:141.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:142.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.12:142.1_3: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalaṁ sekkhāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:143.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— anulomaṁ asekkhāya phalasamāpattiyā …
patthana1.12:143.1_1: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyaṁ asekkhāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:144.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…. (Anantarasadisaṁ, aṭṭha pañhā.)
patthana1.12:145.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:146.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.12:146.1_2: Dutiyo maggo tatiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:146.1_3: Tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:147.1_0: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.12:148.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.12:148.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—ariyā maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ kusalasamāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato …pe…
patthana1.12:148.1_5: Sekkhā phalasamāpatti kāyikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:149.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:149.1_1: **Anantarūpanissayo**—purimā purimā asekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:149.1_2: asekkhaṁ phalaṁ asekkhassa phalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:150.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.12:151.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.12:151.1_7: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.12:151.1_21: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:151.1_22: Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:151.1_24: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:152.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.12:152.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:152.1_2: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:153.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.12:154.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.12:154.1_7: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.12:154.1_10: kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:155.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:156.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:157.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā sekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:158.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā asekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:159.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:160.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:161.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.12:162.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.12:162.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—sekkhā cetanā vipākānaṁ sekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:163.1_0: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:164.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:165.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:166.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—asekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:167.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—asekkhā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:168.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—asekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:169.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.12:169.1_1: **Sahajātā**—nevasekkhanāsekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:169.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—nevasekkhanāsekkhā cetanā vipākānaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:170.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.12:171.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—asekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.12:172.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko nevasekkhanāsekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:173.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:174.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.12:174.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—sekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:175.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.12:176.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.12:176.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:176.1_6: kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:176.1_7: **Pacchājātā**—nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:177.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:178.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:179.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.12:180.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.12:180.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—sekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:181.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:182.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… tīṇi. (Sekkhasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.12:183.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.12:183.1_1: **Sahajāto**—nevasekkhanāsekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:183.1_5: Vatthu khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:183.1_14: vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.12:183.1_19: **Pacchājātā**—nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:184.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:185.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:186.1_0: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.12:186.1_1: **Sahajāto**—sekkho eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:187.1_0: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.12:187.1_1: **Sahajātā**—sekkhā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:187.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—sekkhā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:187.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—sekkhā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:188.1_0: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.12:189.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava, anantare aṭṭha, samanantare aṭṭha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā aṭṭha, vigate aṭṭha, avigate terasa.
patthana1.12:191.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:192.1_0: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:193.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:194.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:195.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:196.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:197.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:198.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:199.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:200.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:201.1_0: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.12:202.1_0: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.12:203.1_0: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā asekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.12:204.1_0: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.12:205.1_0: Nahetuyā cuddasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajāte dasa, naaññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte cuddasa, naāsevane nakamme cuddasa, navipāke dvādasa, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha, nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha.
patthana1.12:207.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme satta, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.12:209.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava, anantare aṭṭha, samanantare aṭṭha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā aṭṭha, vigate aṭṭha, avigate terasa.
